channel.title: [317] Is It Possible To...[317]
channel.description:
Add a full God Wars? In the actual god wars area with boss's minions and make the minions use correct attacks?
Also, fully working Kq where it morphs. into the err i think 2 stages,maybe 3, i forgot.
Thanks

item.title: [317] Is It Possible To...[317]
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

[quote=“x andrew x, post:11, topic:330396”][quote author=Motokid126 link=topic=426776.msg3134480#msg3134480 date=1266797077]

It is possible, I have A FULL Godwars on my 317. First you need to follow a few guides to get the map data and objects that are used in Godwars. It takes some time to get everything perfect. Took me about 2 weeks total to get all bugs out. The hardest part will probably be adding the animations for all of the monsters and adding the global objects to the game.

oh dang lol, well ill work at it.

did u just get all the tutorials from here on mopar? in the tutorial section?
[/quote] I did it from tuts on mopar and the RuneSer**.*** (I Blocked it out myself) Sorry Moparscape the just have more tuts then you.[/quote]

oh i see, well thanks man =)!!
I’m gona try to work on this

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Is It Possible To...[317]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It is possible, I have A FULL Godwars on my 317. First you need to follow a few guides to get the map data and objects that are used in Godwars. It takes some time to get everything perfect. Took me about 2 weeks total to get all bugs out. The hardest part will probably be adding the animations for all of the monsters and adding the global objects to the game.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Is It Possible To...[317]
item.dc:creator: @Conspiracy Conspiracy
item.description:
@Conspiracy wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:7, topic:330396”]Oh ok, i see. I’ll wait on that one then =p. I’d like to code 508’s but i can’t even do a 317 well yet lol…

Btw anyone know how to make a ::tele command like ::teleXcoor Ycoord… The server im working on now doesn’t have that -.-[/quote]

if (command.startsWith(“tele”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 3) {
int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
toX = newPosX;
toY = newPosY;
}
?:E

item.title: [317] Is It Possible To...[317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Motokid126:

Oh

Its perfectly possible, you have to dump the mapdata from a higher revision, and than add it into your 317 cache. Its not the easiest thing in the world, but its possible.
